default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: I can work for you, but let me be clear. I don't do overtime. My efforts should be reasonably scheduled. However, if the MBCC can promise me quadruple hourly pay, I might reluctantly consider it.

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: We have achieved milestones in our work.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: All evils will be exterminated by this lightsaber.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: I won't let any of this unsightly trash escape.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Ah, even the air feels fresher now.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Next time, I'll slash you all to pieces!

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Hahahahah, that's all you got!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: I must stand up... to change all this...!

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Is this today's request? Got it. I'll submit a report before I clock out.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: My work stress comes almost entirely from the people I meet at work, not the work itself.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: Hmm. Still working overtime? Go do something more meaningful, like reading a book. This city labor law is a good one. I presented it at the Nirvana Book Club once. You should really give it a read.

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: Of course, I'll protest against unfair treatment and challenge incorrect propositions. Anything wrong should be corrected. I mean, how else will we make any progress in this world?

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: There are many ways to relieve stress. I relieve mind by playing racket ball. I'd imagine the ball as all the things that annoy me and just smash it with the racket. I can spend an entire evening doing that. I'll send you the address if you're interested.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: Well, my first boss was a useless freeloader, so I threw him to the dump. My second boss was competent, but I wondered if her intelligence was her only gift. As for you, you don't act like a typical superior. But you're probably the best boss I've ever had.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: Doesn't every kid dream of becoming a hero in the novels? But we can't all be the chosen one who has the power to defeat evil. In reality, you either conform or get consumed. But I refuse to let them change me. So, I choose to change them instead.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: Um, working for you is really easy for me. I'm not saying the work here is simple. What I mean is, my mind can get a break here. I'm no longer chased by overwhelming pressure. An ideal world is forming gradually around you. Though it's just a rough model now, I can see it's completed form in the future.

default.title: Idle
default.text: Work-life balance? Ha! Good point! Time to take five and grab a Dispresso.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Bother me again and I'll chop down on your face.

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Get to the point. Don't ruin my plan of getting off on time.

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Request received.

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Work's done. I'm off.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: The new model is more efficient now.

default.title: Deploy
default.text: Nice! I haven't had a chance to decompress in ages.
